title: Senior QA Automation Engineer
aboutMe-details-1: Experienced Senior QA Engineer with a passion for precision and innovation. Skilled in API, automation, mobile, and performance testing, backed by certifications in ISTQB and Scrum Master. Thrives in fast-paced, agile environments, fostering teamwork and delivering top-notch results. I am fluent in English, and have the ability to guide and support teams in achieving their goals.
aboutMe-details-3: Distributed environments | Microservices | Cloud-based applications | Banking and Insurance applications | Startup environment | Databases | Continuous Integration | AWS EC2 | AWS S3 | AWS RDS
